definition-item.definition-title: HAIRDRESSING OR SHAVING EQUIPMENT (wigs, toupees or the like A41G3/00, A41G5/00; hairdressers' chairs A47C1/04; hair cutting appliances, razors B26B); EQUIPMENT FOR COSMETICS OR COSMETIC TREATMENTS, e.g. FOR MANICURING OR PEDICURING

list-item.paragraph-text: Processes of waving, straightening or curling hair;
Hair-curling or hair-waving appliances, e.g. curling-tongs;
Devices for heating or accessories for hair curling appliances;
Devices for washing or colouring the hair or scalp;
Hair drying devices or accessories therefor;
Devices for removing superfluous hair, e.g. tweezers;
Containers, casings or accessories for handling toiletry or cosmetic substances;
Hairdressers' equipment, e.g. protecting mantles, stands for performing hairdressing work, specially adapted furniture;
